data.name: Parkasaurus - Sea Monsters
data.detailed_description:
About Parkasaurus – Sea Monsters:


Don’t lose out on the opportunity to explore the wonderful world of aquatic reptiles and fish! Have you ever wanted to raise a Mosasaurus from a baby or create the perfect home for your ancient Archelon? Now you can. Use fluid water physics to construct aquatic exhibits for your new friends with walkways, heaters, and more.

Sea Monsters features:

  • 10+ New Aquatic reptiles and fish
  • 2 New Missions
  • 3 New Biomes
  • 20+ New Exhibit Items and Hats!



Expand your parks to now include some of the most loved aquatic reptiles and fish:



Dinosaurs: Elasmosaurus, Plesiosaurus, Mosasaurus, Atopodentatus, Sarcosuchus, Archelon, Dunkleosteus, Liopleurodon, Ichthyosaurus, Placodus, Megalodon

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Turkish, Korean, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64 bit only), Windows 8 (64 bit only), Windows 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: X64 Dual Core CPU, 2+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete Non Mobile GPU with 1 GB Ram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64 bit only), Windows 8 (64 bit only), Windows 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: X64 Quad Core CPU, 3+ GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete Non Mobile GPU with 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
